meta.name: Solar Production Overview-Template
meta.description: template created from dashboard: Solar Production Overview

attributes.name: Solar Production Overview
attributes.description: Dashboard displaying the Parker Lane solar production statistics.

queries.text:
from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site")
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "site_power")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
  	(r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and
    r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site" )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "percent", _value: 
        if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
        else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 
  }))

import "experimental"
import "date"

local_time = experimental.addDuration(d: -5h, to: now())

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = -0h

past_30 = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -32d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._value) * -0.001 }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> yield(name: "past_30")

midnight = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == date.monthDay(t: local_time))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "midnight")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_day = union(tables: [midnight, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * -0.001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_day")

union(tables: [past_30, this_day])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r._kwh }))
  |> timeShift(duration: timeAxisShift, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "combined")

import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = -0d

// Extract the last 12 months of production
past_12 = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -13mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._value) * -0.001 }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> yield(name: "past_12")

// Extract the current months of production
first_of_month = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -32d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1 )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "first_of_month")

today = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -2h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "today")

this_month = union(tables: [first_of_month, today])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * -0.001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_month")

// Combine the results in to a single table with '_value' and '_time' as the axes
union(tables: [past_12, this_month])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: timeAxisShift, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "combined")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power")
  |> sample(n: 10, pos: 1)

panel_area = 144.0
panel_efficiency = 0.1725

// Collect the site total production data
from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) * 3600.0 / float(v: r.elapsed) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["elapsed", "_start", "_stop", "_field", "_inverter", "_measurement"])
  |> yield(name: "production")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field == "irradiance")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * panel_area * panel_efficiency }))
  |> yield(name: "irradiance")

import "experimental"
import "date"

local_time = experimental.addDuration(d: -5h, to: now())

midnight = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == date.monthDay(t: local_time))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "midnight")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -2h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_day = union(tables: [midnight, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: experimental.addDuration(d: 1h, to: r._time), _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_day")

import "experimental"
import "date"

// Extract the current months of production
first_of_month = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -32d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1 )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "first_of_month")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -2h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_month = union(tables: [first_of_month, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total_wh"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: experimental.addDuration(d: 1h, to: r._time), _kwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_month")

import "experimental"
import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = 15d

// Extract the current months of production
first_of_year = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -370d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == 1 and date.month(t: r._time) == 1 )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "first_of_year")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_year = union(tables: [first_of_year, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total_wh"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: experimental.addDuration(d: 1h, to: r._time), _mwh: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.000001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_year")

import "experimental"
import "date"

// This can be used to align results with x-axis labels
timeAxisShift = 0h

local_time = experimental.addDuration(d: -5h, to: now())

midnight = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "midnight")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => date.monthDay(t: r._time) == date.monthDay(t: local_time) )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "midnight")

right_now = from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _total_wh: r._value }))
  |> yield(name: "right_now")

this_day = union(tables: [midnight, right_now])
  |> sort(columns: ["_total_wh"], desc: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: false, columns: ["_total_wh"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: experimental.addDuration(d: 1h, to: r._time), _kgco2e: float(v: r._total_wh) * 0.18991 * 0.001 }))
  |> yield(name: "this_day")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "derating"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._inverter == "sb71")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "status") and (r._field == "derating"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._inverter == "sb72")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._inverter == "sb72")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -30m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field== "elevation")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "sun_elevation")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -30m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field== "azimuth")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "sun_azimuthelevation")

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter== "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kgco2e: float(v: r._value) * 0.001 * 0.18991 * 0.001 }))
